summary: Create a backup of Salesforce metadata before deployment
description: Creates a comprehensive backup of metadata that will be deployed. Supports both sf-orgdevmode-builds (buildfile.json) and standard (package.xml) deployment modes. The backup includes retrieved metadata, recovery manifests, and destructive changes for rollback.
flags.target-org.summary: Salesforce org to backup metadata from
flags.manifest.summary: Path to buildfile.json or package.xml (auto-detects mode from extension)
flags.no-compress.summary: Skip compression of backup into tar.gz archive
